segments.template: {{ if .Working.Changed }}  <p:grey>[</>{{ if (gt .Working.Added 0) }}+{{ .Working.Added }}{{ if or (gt .Working.Modified 0) (gt .Working.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Working.Modified 0) }}~{{ .Working.Modified }}{{ if (gt .Working.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Working.Deleted 0) }}-{{ .Working.Deleted }}{{ end }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ if .Staging.Changed }}  <p:grey>[</>{{ if (gt .Staging.Added 0) }}+{{ .Staging.Added }}{{ if or (gt .Staging.Modified 0) (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Staging.Modified 0) }}~{{ .Staging.Modified }}{{ if (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}-{{ .Staging.Deleted }}{{ end }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ if (gt .StashCount 0) }}  <p:grey>[</>{{ .StashCount }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ if .Upstream }} {{ .UpstreamIcon }} {{ if or (gt .Ahead 0) (gt .Behind 0) }}<p:grey>[</>{{ if (gt .Ahead 0) }}↑{{ .Ahead }}{{ if (gt .Behind 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Behind 0) }}↓{{ .Behind }}{{ end }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if or (.Upstream) (.Working.Changed) (.Staging.Changed) (gt .StashCount 0) }} {{ end }}

properties.template: {{ if .Working.Changed }}  <p:grey>[</>{{ if (gt .Working.Added 0) }}+{{ .Working.Added }}{{ if or (gt .Working.Modified 0) (gt .Working.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Working.Modified 0) }}~{{ .Working.Modified }}{{ if (gt .Working.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Working.Deleted 0) }}-{{ .Working.Deleted }}{{ end }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ if .Staging.Changed }}  <p:grey>[</>{{ if (gt .Staging.Added 0) }}+{{ .Staging.Added }}{{ if or (gt .Staging.Modified 0) (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Staging.Modified 0) }}~{{ .Staging.Modified }}{{ if (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}-{{ .Staging.Deleted }}{{ end }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ if (gt .StashCount 0) }}  <p:grey>[</>{{ .StashCount }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ if .Upstream }} {{ .UpstreamIcon }} {{ if or (gt .Ahead 0) (gt .Behind 0) }}<p:grey>[</>{{ if (gt .Ahead 0) }}↑{{ .Ahead }}{{ if (gt .Behind 0) }}<p:grey>|</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if (gt .Behind 0) }}↓{{ .Behind }}{{ end }}<p:grey>]</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if or (.Upstream) (.Working.Changed) (.Staging.Changed) (gt .StashCount 0) }} {{ end }}
